description.value:
As a desperate action, you can move to any creature that is no more than half your movement speed away from you and use the Assist action on it. Unlike other desperate actions, you can use this ability to interrupt the desperate actions of willing creatures.
    Unfortunately, onlookers may become annoyed if you keep inserting yourself into pivotal moments in this way. Each time you use this ability again before your next short rest, become @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.conditions.WHN3T2G6R8HUKOQX]{🧿 Villainized} until the end of your next turn. You only suffer from the baseline effects of being villainized, not any other abilities you have that would apply to creatures you've villainized.

system.requirements: Must have a Bard Adept Ability
